participant_1.background:
I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
i am a father.

participant_2.background:
I'm not great at keeping up with my family, but I'm trying to be better.
I went to a local metal show for my last birthday.
when people don t like my social media posts , it upsets me.
I used to wear a lot of black because it was easy to put together outfits.
I am single and live with my three cats.

content.text: Doing well, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing alright, thank you for asking! I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure it's not easy. Is there anything I can do to help?
Not really, but thank you for the offer. I'm just trying to take it day by day.
That's a good way to do it. It's okay to grieve and process the breakup in your own way.
I agree. I'm just trying to stay positive and keep my mind occupied.
That's great! What are you doing to stay busy?
I've been spending a lot of time with my kids and I've been trying to get back into my hobbies.
That's great! It sounds like you're doing all the right things.
You're welcome! Let me know if there's anything else I can do to help.
